casebody.data:
Christopher MARLOWE, Applicant,
v.
James M. LEBLANC, Secretary, Louisiana Department of Public Safety and Corrections, et al. No. 19A1039. Supreme Court of the United States. May 29, 2020

Application to vacate stay presented to Justice Alito and by him referred to the Court denied. Nothing in this order should be construed to preclude Applicant from filing a grievance setting out specifically the relief he requests be provided to him in the prison, and in the event that such request is filed, it should be decided promptly.
